articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description: Re @me256ow will be speaking on the need for ‘Social Layers’ in DAOs — which are particularly important in communities and spaces that are quite heavily geared towards ‘building’. And how these social layers can be leveraged to engage members in formats outside of just work.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @CryptoPowerGals will be speaking on the importance of having ‘Structures & Processes’ in place, when building a DAO — and how they are integral:
• to facilitating how people gather
• to facilitate work
• to reward work
• and to appraise the standard of work that is done

The Oasis Privacy Layer — powered by Sapphire, the EVM-compatible ParaTime for web3 — allows Solidity developers to build privacy-enabled dApps with ease
Use Sapphire to build new confidential dApps ✨or✨ add confidentiality to established dApps, without sacrificing anything
